title: Port Mirroring Test
objective: Test Objective : 6.5.4 Port Mirroring: Support single-port mirroring and multi-port mirroring. The mirrored port should ensure the system-required forwarding rate without data loss.

steps.description: Test frame length is 64 bytes, test duration is not less than 30s;
Test configuration as shown in Figure 7, set port 4 of the switch as the mirror port, and ports 1 and 3 as mirrored ports, mirroring mode is both input and output;
Port 1 sends data bidirectionally to port 2, and port 2 and port 3 send data bidirectionally, with load rates of 25% respectively;
steps.expected_result: Record the number of frames received by port 4, and determine whether the mirroring function is set successfully.
